member.name: M:WebMatrix.WebData.ExtendedMembershipProvider.DeleteOAuthAccount(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the OAuth and OpenID account with the specified provider name and provider user id.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.WebData.ExtendedMembershipProvider.CreateOrUpdateOAuthAccount(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new OAuth account with the specified data or update an existing one if it already exists.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.WebData.ExtendedMembershipProvider.GetUserIdFromOAuth(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the id of the user with the specified provider name and provider user id.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.WebData.ExtendedMembershipProvider.GetUserNameFromId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the username of a user with the given id

member.name: M:WebMatrix.WebData.ExtendedMembershipProvider.HasLocalAccount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether there exists a local account (as opposed to OAuth account) with the specified userId.
member.param: The user id to check for local account.
member.returns: true if there is a local account with the specified user id]; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.WebData.ExtendedMembershipProvider.GetOAuthTokenSecret(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the OAuth token secret from the specified OAuth token.
member.param: The token from which to retrieve secret.
member.returns: The token secret of the specified token

member.name: M:WebMatrix.WebData.ExtendedMembershipProvider.StoreOAuthRequestToken(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Stores the specified token and secret into database.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.WebData.ExtendedMembershipProvider.ReplaceOAuthRequestTokenWithAccessToken(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Replaces the request token with access token and secret in the database.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.WebData.ExtendedMembershipProvider.DeleteOAuthToken(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the OAuth token from the backing store from the database.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.WebData.ExtendedMembershipProvider.GetAccountsForUser(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all OAuth accounts associated with the specified username

member.name: M:WebMatrix.WebData.SimpleMembershipProvider.ConfirmAccount(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the confirmed flag for the username if it is correct.
member.returns: True if the account could be successfully confirmed. False if the username was not found or the confirmation token is invalid.
member.remarks: Inherited from ExtendedMembershipProvider ==> Simple Membership MUST be enabled to use this method

member.name: M:WebMatrix.WebData.SimpleMembershipProvider.ConfirmAccount(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the confirmed flag for the username if it is correct.
member.returns: True if the account could be successfully confirmed. False if the username was not found or the confirmation token is invalid.
member.remarks: Inherited from ExtendedMembershipProvider ==> Simple Membership MUST be enabled to use this method. There is a tiny possibility where this method fails to work correctly. Two or more users could be assigned the same token but specified using different cases. A workaround for this would be to use the overload that accepts both the user name and confirmation token.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.WebData.SimpleMembershipProvider.ReplaceOAuthRequestTokenWithAccessToken(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Replaces the request token with access token and secret.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.WebData.SimpleMembershipProvider.DeleteOAuthToken(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the OAuth token from the backing store from the database.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.WebData.SimpleMembershipProvider.HasLocalAccount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether there exists a local account (as opposed to OAuth account) with the specified userId.
member.param: The user id to check for local account.
member.returns: true if there is a local account with the specified user id]; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the method has been initialized.
